query:
SELECT
                    pn.id,
                    pn.node_version,
                    n.publisher_name,
                    n.identifier_name,
                    n.container_type::TEXT AS container_type
                FROM
                    pipeline_nodes pn
                JOIN
                    nodes n ON pn.node_id = n.id
                WHERE
                    pn.pipeline_id = $1
